author: Tobias_Jeltsch
title: My father liked this a lot when he got it on the ferry trip from Germany to Finland about 30 years ago
review: This ship is very different from most other Lego ships as it is build entirely of standard parts. Thus it won't float in your bathtub. It contains awfully many 1x1 flat white and transparent pieces for the windows and I have lost many of them over the years. It quite tedious to build compared to other ships, but that was just fine for the long ship ride.
